BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
‘A’  WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
Date : 15.2.2005 
 
Circular No. 7/2005 
 
 
In supersession of this Bureau Circular No. 37/2002 dated 
24.09.2002, the Personal Security Officers (PSOs) of Shri L.K. 
Advani, Leader of Opposition (Lok Sabha), are permitted to carry their 
weapons and ammunitions on their persons or in their hand baggage on 
board the flight.  The weapons will be carried in fully unloaded 
condition i.e. weapons and ammunitions shall be kept separately while 
accompanying the dignitary on board the aircraft.  
 
 
 
 
 
( R.C.Tayal) 
Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution: As per standard list
